TopicTitle: Found a space flight sim - Exoflight

Articles.Content:
So after a rigorous and exhausting search through google (I typed in 'space flight simulator'), I came upon this thing. It actually is quite fun, but it does not really give a good tutorial at all. I\'m still trying to figure out how to play this. Here\'s a video of it (seemingly the only one in existence):

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q1GIlQj2Uhg

I\'m going to have to do some digging as to how to play this correctly, it doesn\'t make it easy.

Here\'s where I downloaded it:

http://code.google.com/p/exoflight/

Also, ctrl+0 is full throttle, ctrl+5 is 50% throttle, ctrl+1 is no throttle.

Running this thing is impossible for me.

I don\'t see why.
You need java runtime environment 1.6. That may be it. If it\'s not, then I don\'t know what would be wrong.

I like how \'slow\' and graceful everything looks.

Retro instrument panel is easy on the eyes too.

It appears that the missions aren\'t all set up to be in the game from the start. If you go into the missions folder and open up 'default', you\'ll see the mission names with an '=' after them, but some have a ';' after them as well. Delete all the ;\'s, this will let the missions be played.
